txt.en: 'Though we have recovered Narchuil, Goeolgon yet lives, and is rebuilding his power in Barad Dúrgul. He thirsts for revenge and will soon bring his power to bear upon us if he is allowed to recover.\n\n'Barad Dúrgul awaits, when you are ready to leave, come and speak with me again.'
'So, Handarod has sent you afield gain has he?\n\n'I am not certain how Goeolgon was able to rebuild his strength again so quickly, but I thank you for your efforts to keep his evil in check.'
'Are you ready to enter Barad Dúrgul? We must destroy Goeolgon before he regains his strength!'
'You have returned empty handed! You must go back to Barad Dúrgul and seek the ring Narchuil.'
Handarod has told you that the Enemy holds the ring Narchuil at Barad Dúrgul. Though it is a minor essay in Ringcraft, it is dangerous nonetheless.
Handarod is at Esteldín in the North Downs.\n\nHandarod has bid you enter Barad Dúrgul and recover the ring Narchuil.
Gwathryn is at Tármunn Súrsa in Angmar.\n\nYou should report to Gwathryn at once.
